mapper.sql: SELECT WMS_WAREHOUSE.ID FROM WMS_WAREHOUSE WHERE WMS_WAREHOUSE.ID != '1643'
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum r FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS transferId, t1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId, t1.transfer_to AS transferTo, t1.remark AS remark, t1.status AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.logistic_no AS logisticNo, t1.handled_by AS handledBy, t1.consignee AS consignee, t1.contact AS contact, t1.transfer_sale AS transferSale, t1.transfer_send AS transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice AS transferInvoice, t1.order_amount AS orderAmount, t2.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, t1.flow_type AS flowType FROM wms_transfer t1 LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse t2 ON t1.warehouse_id = t2.id
t1.id=#{transferId} and t1.transfer_to like '%${transferTo}%' and t1.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} and t1.status=#{status} and t1.logistic_no=#{logisticNo} and t1.create_time >= #{createTimeBegin} and t1.create_time <= #{createTimeEnd} and t1.ORDER_PUSH_STATUS is null
order by t1.create_time desc ) A
WHERE rownum<=#{page.endRow} ) WHERE r >= #{page.startRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum r FROM( SELECT t1. ID AS transferId, t1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId, t1.transfer_to AS transferTo, t1.remark AS remark, t1.status AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.logistic_no AS logisticNo, t1.handled_by AS handledBy, t1.consignee AS consignee, t1.contact AS contact, t1.transfer_sale AS transferSale, t1.transfer_send AS transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice AS transferInvoice, t1.order_amount AS orderAmount, t2.warehouse_name AS warehouseName ,TG.sku_code AS skuCode, TG.sku_name AS skuName, TG.quantity AS quantity, TG.measure_unit AS measureUnit, TG.indiv_enabled AS indivEnabled, TG.unit_price AS unitPrice , TB.rm FROM wms_transfer t1 LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse t2 ON t1.warehouse_id = t2. ID LEFT JOIN WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS TG ON t1. ID = TG.transfer_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) rm, WIF.FLOW_ID, WIF.SKU_CODE FROM WMS_INDIV_FLOW WIF WHERE WIF.FLOW_TYPE = 104 GROUP BY WIF.FLOW_ID, WIF.SKU_CODE) TB ON tb.flow_id = t1.id and tb.sku_code = tg.sku_code
t1.id=#{transferId} and t1.transfer_to like '%${transferTo}%' and t1.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} and t1.status=#{status} and t1.transfer_to != #{transferTo} and t1.logistic_no=#{logisticNo} and t1.create_time >= #{createTimeBegin} and t1.create_time <= #{createTimeEnd} AND t1.ORDER_PUSH_STATUS IS NULL
ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC ) A
WHERE rownum<=#{page.endRow} ) WHERE r >= #{page.startRow}

SELECT t1.id AS transferId, t1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId, t1.transfer_to AS transferTo, t1.remark AS remark, t1.status AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.logistic_no AS logisticNo, t1.handled_by AS handledBy, t1.consignee AS consignee, t1.contact AS contact, t1.po AS po, t1.logistic_name AS logisticName, t1.transfer_sale AS transferSale, t1.transfer_send AS transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice AS transferInvoice, t1.order_amount AS orderAmount, t1.trans_type AS transType, t1.flow_type AS flowType, t2.warehouse_name AS warehouseName, t3a.name AS tSale, t3b.name AS tSend, t3c.name AS tInvoice, t1.order_confirm_status AS orderConfirmStatus, t1.order_push_status AS orderPushStatus FROM wms_transfer t1 LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse t2 ON t1.warehouse_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN wms_transfer_partner t3a ON t1.transfer_sale = t3a.id LEFT JOIN wms_transfer_partner t3b ON t1.transfer_send = t3b.id LEFT JOIN wms_transfer_partner t3c ON t1.transfer_invoice = t3c.id WHERE t1.id = #{transferId}

select t1.id as transferId, t1.warehouse_id as warehouseId, t3.warehouse_name as transferTo, t1.remark as remark, t1.status as status, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.logistic_no as logisticNo, t1.handled_by as handledBy, t1.consignee as consignee, t1.contact as contact, t1.transfer_sale as transferSale, t1.transfer_send as transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice as transferInvoice, t1.order_amount as orderAmount, t1.order_push_status as orderPushStatus, t1.order_confirm_status as orderConfirmStatus, t2.warehouse_name as warehouseName from wms_transfer t1 left join wms_warehouse t2 on t1.warehouse_id=t2.id left join wms_warehouse t3 on t1.transfer_to=t3.id where t1.id=#{transferId}

SELECT t1.id AS transferId, t1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId, t1.remark AS remark, t1.status AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.order_push_status AS orderPushStatus, t1.logistic_no AS logisticNo, t1.handled_by AS handledBy, t1.consignee AS consignee, t1.contact AS contact, t1.transfer_sale AS transferSale, t1.transfer_send AS transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice AS transferInvoice, t1.order_amount AS orderAmount, t1.TRANSFER_TO AS transferTo FROM wms_transfer t1 WHERE t1.status = 2 AND t1.order_push_status = 0 AND T1.TRANSFER_TO IN ()

SELECT t1.id AS transferId, t1.warehouse_id AS warehouseId, t1.remark AS remark, t1.status AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.order_push_status AS orderPushStatus, t1.order_confirm_status AS orderConfirmStatus, t1.logistic_no AS logisticNo, t1.handled_by AS handledBy, t1.consignee AS consignee, t1.contact AS contact, t1.transfer_sale AS transferSale, t1.transfer_send AS transferSend, t1.transfer_invoice AS transferInvoice, t1.order_amount AS orderAmount, t1.TRANSFER_TO AS transferTo FROM wms_transfer t1 WHERE t1.status = 2 AND t1.order_confirm_status = 0 AND t1.order_push_status = 1 AND T1.TRANSFER_TO IN ()

SELECT t2.IMEI as po FROM WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS t1 LEFT JOIN WMS_SALES_ORDER_IMEI t2 ON t1.TRANSFER_ID = t2.ORDER_CODE WHERE t1.TRANSFER_ID = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.SKU_CODE = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into wms_transfer(id, warehouse_id, transfer_to, remark, logistic_no, create_time, handled_by, consignee, contact, po, logistic_name, transfer_sale, transfer_send, transfer_invoice, order_amount, trans_type, flow_type) values(#{transferId}, #{warehouseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{handledBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{po, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferSale}, #{transferSend}, #{transferInvoice}, #{orderAmount}, #{transType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{flowType, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into wms_transfer(id, warehouse_id, transfer_to, remark, logistic_no, create_time, handled_by, consignee, contact,order_amount, trans_type,order_push_status) values(#{transferId}, #{warehouseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{handledBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount}, #{transType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderPushStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_transfer_goods (id,transfer_id,sku_id,sku_code,sku_name,quantity,measure_unit,indiv_enabled,unit_price,qty) values (#{id},#{transferId},#{skuId},#{skuCode},#{skuName},#{quantity},#{measureUnit},(select indiv_enabled from wms_wares where id=(select wares_id from wms_sku where id=#{skuId})), #{unitPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.transfer_id as transferId, t.sku_id as skuId, t.sku_code as skuCode, t.sku_name as skuName, t.quantity as quantity, t.measure_unit as measureUnit, t.indiv_enabled as indivEnabled, t.unit_price as unitPrice, case t.indiv_enabled when '1' then (select count(1) from wms_indiv where sku_id=t.sku_id and prepare_id=t.transfer_id and stock_status=3) else t.prepared_num end as preparedNum from WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS t where t.transfer_id=#{transferId}

select t.id as id, t.transfer_id as transferId, t.sku_id as skuId, t.sku_code as skuCode, t.sku_name as skuName, t.quantity as quantity, t.measure_unit as measureUnit, t.indiv_enabled as indivEnabled, t.unit_price as unitPrice, (select count(1) from wms_indiv_flow where flow_id=#{transferId} and flow_type=104 and sku_id=t.sku_id) as rmaNum from WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS t where t.transfer_id=#{transferId}

SELECT t.id AS id, t.transfer_id AS transferId, t.sku_id AS skuId, t.sku_code AS skuCode, t.sku_name AS skuName, t.quantity AS quantity, t.measure_unit AS measureUnit, t.indiv_enabled AS indivEnabled, t.unit_price AS unitPrice, t.qty AS qty, t.PREPARED_NUM AS preparedNum FROM WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS t WHERE t.transfer_id = #{transferId}

select t.id as id, t.transfer_id as transferId, t.sku_id as skuId, t.sku_code as skuCode, t.sku_name as skuName, t.quantity as quantity, t.measure_unit as measureUnit, t.indiv_enabled as indivEnabled, t.unit_price as unitPrice, t.prepared_num as preparedNum, t.qty as qty from WMS_TRANSFER_GOODS t
t.transfer_id=#{transferId} and t.sku_code=#{skuCode} and t.id=#{goodsId}
mapper.insert:
insert into wms_transfer(id,TRANSFER_TO,create_time,CONSIGNEE, contact,order_amount, flow_type) values
( #{item.transferId}, #{item.transferTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate, #{item.consignee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderAmount},#{item.flowType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
